23.「フィッシングコンテストとは| 開催期間内に 旬のさかなを釣ってきてもらい| そ:
A fishing contest is a competition to see who|can catch the best fish of the season during|the contest period. If you catch a fish in|
|season, we'll reward you according to its|size, so first and foremost, show it to me...|And more! If the size of your fish is in the|
|top 200 at the end of the contest, you'll get|a huge reward! As a reminder, if you don't|show me your fish in season, you won't be|
|rewarded by size, nor will you be ranked...|So please don't forget to show me your|seasonal fish when you catch them! Please be|
|very careful!

24.「旬のさかなは 旬の釣りざおと| 旬のルアーの組み合わせ 以外では| 絶対に釣れ:
Please note that you can never catch fish in|season unless you use the right combination|of fishing lure and the right fishing bait.|
|Also, if you use up or lose any of the|fishing gear I gave you, I will give you a|new one... Also, regarding the treatment of|
|seasonal fish on the fish list, when they are|in season, there's nothing about them on the|list... And the original fish, the number of|
|fish caught and the size of the fish are|never counted... The difference in size is so|great that the higher-ups can't seem to|
|decide whether to recognize them as monsters|or fish... But with this contest, if more|research is done on seasonal fish, maybe one|
|day they'll be recognized as fish! ... And|there's some information on seasonal fish|that I'm curious about... It seems that when|
|the weather is rough, the fish in season are|often seen in large schools, and you don't|see many other fish in the fishing grounds...|
|Maybe it's a good idea to go to fishing spots|with seasonal fish at such times...
